Text:
If he did hate the USA it would be because of racist douche bag cowards ("anonymous") that post this kind of shit, or write this kind of shit, and the people who read/listen to it while banging their daughters and go "sounds right ta me".

BUT he doesn't, so no worries.

Anything by Dinesh D. Souza is a piece of crap. The man is flaming idiot. And this... this appears to be his shining beacon of lunacy.

Waste your time on this nonsense if you must but me, I'll pass, thank you very much.

@alintheval
So the only possible reason to be against the policies of Obama is because one is "racist"?
Couldn't a simple aversion of socialism cause it?

BTW you probably meant to use the word "bigoted" or "prejudiced".  Get a dictionary and look up the word "racist" you fucking moron.
